messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Mr. Bean
messages.messageBody:
<<THAT is a matter of opinion. A lot of outwardly hunky guys lose all of
their appeal when they open their mouths. Funny men, especially intelligent
funny men are extremely "doable" in my scope of things. Mr. Bean can make
me laugh, VERY sexy.>>

Kris,

You are my kind of people! LOL I was thinking the same thing but a little
shy about admitting it! ROFL!! I'd "do" Mr. Bean before I'd "do" Nick Cage!
Man, I find him (Cage) sexy visually, but the man is a DUD! And dumber
than a doorknob.....

But, just to make it easier, I'll stick to "doing" my husband. He'll
probably apperciate that! <BWG>

Jennifer

their appeal when they open their mouths. Funny men, especially intelligent
funny men are extremely "doable" in my scope of things. Mr. Bean can make
me laugh, VERY sexy.

Kris

-Madeline
